channel.title: What makes you so addicted?
channel.description:
Hello,
Ok this is where it comes down to the discussion about if you are "Addicted" or not, i remember when i first joined runescape all i wanted to do was play, and yes i admit it, i did... I think the reason i liked runescape and got quite addicted was that the fact is a online "Competitive" game. The way there was high scores and people trying there best to become high in that skill, to get a chance to feel good when pking etc, whats your reason?

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Tenac, post:16, topic:267142”][quote author=pork pl0x link=topic=352684.msg2754837#msg2754837 date=1240143205]
pking in runescape classic is the reason i still play private servers.

pking in runescape 2 sucks…
[/quote]
There is no pking in runescape 2 anymore :P[/quote]
If you don’t count: PvP worlds, Clan wars, castle wars, duel arena, Bounty Hunter, Soul Wars, Fist of Guthix and such, then no.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Tenac Tenac
item.description:
@Tenac wrote:

[quote=“pork pl0x, post:1, topic:274357”]pking in runescape classic is the reason i still play private servers.

pking in runescape 2 sucks…[/quote]

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:14, topic:267142”][quote author=Tenac link=topic=352684.msg2742180#msg2742180 date=1239418613]

Lol console fps taking skill

The first couple times I ever played Counterstrike on the PC, I was always getting ranked in the top 3, and I have never played an FPS on the PC before that, but whenever I get a new FPS game on the 360, I suck balls at it for a while, as does everyone else.
[/quote]
That doesn’t prove anything. Perhaps you are just naturally good at counterstrike.[/quote]
or you played with mentally handicapped children

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

[quote=“Tenac, post:9, topic:267142”]People like games they are good at, and RuneScape allows you to feel you are better than other people because achieving higher skills and gaining more expensive armor makes you feel superior to other people. That combined with the MMO aspect of walking around and chatting gives you a whole world of people to show it off too.

I can admit I was addicted at one time, but i only play FPS games on my 360 now because I have a lot of rlf who do and it takes something called ‘skill’.[/quote]
cool I like inferior controls too

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:

Lol console fps taking skill

Read full topic

That combined with the MMO aspect of walking around and chatting gives you a whole world of people to show it off too.

I can admit I was addicted at one time, but i only play FPS games on my 360 now because I have a lot of rlf who do and it takes something called ‘skill’.[/quote]

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Tenac Tenac
item.description:
@Tenac wrote:

People like games they are good at, and RuneScape allows you to feel you are better than other people because achieving higher skills and gaining more expensive armor makes you feel superior to other people. That combined with the MMO aspect of walking around and chatting gives you a whole world of people to show it off too.

I can admit I was addicted at one time, but i only play FPS games on my 360 now because I have a lot of rlf who do and it takes something called ‘skill’.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Man_UTD_Freak Man UTD Freak
item.description:
@Man_UTD_Freak wrote:

My friend told me about this game back in about 2004 I think. Since then, up to 2007 I was thoroughly addicted probably because of the obvious, PKing, and the urge to get your skills into the high scores, but I don’t play nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

I’ve played since around march '04. The first thing that got me was money making; being richer than everyone else :P. Since I got out of that I used to PK all the time when I was on RS until the wilderness changes happened. I was already into RSPS’s before the wild changes, but the wild changes inspired me a lot more to work on private servers. Every server I’ve made has been a pking one, or one based around pking.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

when I played it was all about pking and phats.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

TeleNubby:

PKing.

Pking was only good before jagex took out wildy pking.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @Johnisriot Johnisriot
item.description:
@Johnisriot wrote:

Well, I played when RSC came out and it was either being greedy collecting rares, meds, squares, and getting rich and killing everyone. So pretty much pking and staking. Also autoing lol.

Read full topic

item.title: What makes you so addicted?
item.dc:creator: @A_Legend A Legend
item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

PKing.

I’m guessing allot of people will say pking, at the time when most people first joined towards the start of runescape, pking was one of the main mini games, but now we have allot more different ones, but still my opinion is that there still not as good.

Read full topic
